alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:06PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips and southwestern Valley Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 705 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles southwest of Hinsdale, or 30 miles southeast of Malta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Bentonite Plant and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
